categories: Category:Battles of the Hunt for Zsinj

nodes.text: Battle of New Alderaan  (Hunt for Zsinj)

Not long after the end of the Bacta War in 7 ABY, a battle occurred during the Hunt for Zsinj of the Galactic Civil War when the forces of Warlord Zsinj discovered the location of the planet New Alderaan. The planet was evacuated before his forces attacked, and it was at least five months before the Alderaanian refugees could reclaim the world. Two days after the battle, Zsinj's forces struck at Gravan Seven.
